Key Match Events: Cruz struggled defensively in center field, allowing a triple and a double that resulted in runs, as the Pirates lost to the Royals 5-1
Pre-Game Insights: Cruz expressed confidence in his ability to play center field, stating he feels comfortable and is not coming back to shortstop
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton acknowledged that Cruz will experience 'bumps in the road' as he adjusts to the new position, but praised his attitude and willingness to learn
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cruz is using a Michael A. Taylor glove in his first few weeks in center field and intends to keep using it
Cruz has done well going side to side in center field, making multiple running catches with 50% catch probabilities
Others: The coaching staff has liked how Cruz has attacked center field, but teachable moments like Saturday are inevitable
Shelton emphasized the importance of Cruz learning to make plays that require him to go back on the ball and freeze before taking initial drop steps
